H0.text: Which playwright and poet became President of his country in 1989. Samuel Beckett

H1.text: Which playwright and poet became President of his country in 1989. Harold Pinter

H2.text: Which playwright and poet became President of his country in 1989. Pablo Neruda

H3.text: Which playwright and poet became President of his country in 1989. Vaclav Havel

A4.text: On 29 December 1989, while he was leader of the Civic Forum, Havel became President of Czechoslovakia by a unanimous vote of the Federal Assembly.
